sentences.en: All payment via Credit Cards will be converted based on exchange rate Indonesian Rupiah currency.
sentences.cn: 注意:在您入住后需以当地货币付款.兑换汇率会有波动.

sentences.en: An Indonesian maid was filmed ill - treating her employer's two - year - old son at home on a hidden camera.
sentences.cn: 闭路电视录像了一名印佣虐待两 岁 幼主.

sentences.en: Yes, we have an Indonesian restaurant right here on the second floor.
sentences.cn: 行李员:有, 就在二层.

trans.tran_cn: （有关）印度尼西亚的，（有关）印度尼西亚人（语）的
trans.tran_en: Indonesian means belonging or relating to Indonesia, or to its people or culture

trans.tran_cn: 印度尼西亚人，印度尼西亚人后裔，西澳特罗尼西亚语族，（东印度群岛）前马来人的一员
